      void drawScan(int y, int x, int numPxls)
      Rasterizer calls this method for each scan it produced

    • Method Detail

      • drawScan

        void drawScan(int y,
            int x,
            int numPxls)
        Rasterizer calls this method for each scan it produced
        Parameters:
        y - the Y coordinate for the scan
        x - the X coordinate for the scan
        numPxls - the number of pixels in the scan
